Dear Gordon and group First I am on digest mode so am a little slow in 
answering. I got out my kanji books and I think it is Sho ? (Nelson 
2105) meaning prosperous. I think this would be a good kanji for a 
tsuba. If you look in Japanese Art Signatures page 211 (#772) and use 
your imagination you can see the kanji. Well maybe! :) david - new 
swords at my web site for sale, http://www.montanairon.com
